name: accessibility-js-routines
description: A library with commonly used accessibility routines.
author: Zoltan Hawryluk

scripts.build:module: (cat js/accessibility.js; echo; echo 'export default accessibility;') > dist/accessibility.module.js; npx babel js/accessibility.module.js --out-file dist/accessibility-es4.module.js
scripts.build:module:prod: (cat js/accessibility.js; echo; echo 'export default accessibility;') > dist/accessibility.module.js; BABEL_ENV=production npx babel dist/accessibility.module.js --out-file dist/accessibility-es4-min.module.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build; npm run build:prod; npm run build:module:prod
